item.title: Rory Sutherland: Life lessons from an ad man
Top 10 Skills You Need at Work That Have Nothing to Do with Your Job
item.description:
Top 10 Skills You Need at Work That Have Nothing to Do with Your Job

Hiring managers make the difficult decision of who the best candidate is for the job based not just on the specific job requirements but also basic "soft skills" every worker should have, like communication and teamwork. Here are the top 10 additional job skills everyone needs.

item.title: 5 Tips For Running Effective Facebook Ads Split Testing Campaigns | SEJ
item.description:
5 Tips For Running Effective Facebook Ads Split Testing Campaigns | SEJ

Dr. Ronald Niednagel once said: " Failure isn't failure unless you don't learn from it. " Viewing failure as feedback is integral if you want to achieve success as an entrepreneur, and this couldn't be truer in the world of Facebook marketing. Facebook ads can fail spectacularly...

item.title: Kako Postati Stručnjak Za Internet Marketing
item.description:
08/03/2017.

,

Kako Postati Stručnjak Za Internet Marketing

,,

Najveći problem s kojim sam se suočavao sve ove godine, nije nedostatak literature, nego upravo suprotno. Višak od kojega ne znate kako i na koji način odabrati ono najbolje. Internet jeste donio pristup informacijama, ali jako puno je nekorisnih stvari i gubljenje vremena na čitanje besmislica više nitko ne može priuštiti.
